title: Cozy and Charming in Mount Airy
description:
This beautiful, bright end row in West Mount Airy shows more like a twin - there are windows along the side of the home, which look out onto the adjacent woods. The house itself is cozy and charming with hardwood floors throughout, radiator heating, and plenty of natural light pouring in.
The house features an updated kitchen with natural cherry cabinets, and gas cooking. Other notable features include a fenced in side patio, a covered front porch, a washer and dryer, plenty of garage and basement space for storage, street parking in the front and off street parking in the single entrance communal back alley way.
The location is as convenient as it gets with the Lovett Library, Acme, Mt Airy Playground, and the local shops and restaurants of Germantown Avenue all a short walk away. The house is situated between the 23 bus route and the Chestnut Hill West Regional Rail line which both lead directly into the adjacent neighborhoods and Center City.
The neighborhood is friendly, safe, and full of welcoming cafes and community spaces. Within walking distance you will find High Point Cafe which is located in an old train station building next to the Chestnut Hill West line, and Avenues Cafe which hosts monthly art shows and seasonal community events. A quick trip on the 23 will bring you to Uncle Bobbies Books and Coffee Shop in Germantown and to the historic Germantown house museums.
The house is also minutes from Carpenter Woods, the Wissahickon, and the northwest corners of Fairmount Park which offer an abundance of green spaces to explore on foot or by bike.
Reach out today to schedule a showing!

title: Bright, Sustainable 2 Bed, Backyard, Pocket Park
description:
This Bright Common renovation reframed this turn of the century row home into a sustainable gem in this era! Bills are low with efficient utilities and the space is filled with light through all months of the year!
This is a 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom row home with original pine floors, a loft style layout and artful details through out. The amenities include: dishwasher, washer, dryer, large backyard with permeable pavers, a semi-finished basement that could be used as workspace. There is a gated alley entry from the street that is partially covered for bike storage.
This home is 3 blocks from the EL (blue line) which allows one to be in Center City within 15 minutes, 3 blocks from the Kensington Community Food Coop, Hello Donuts, Martha, Philadelphia Brewing Company, Franny Lous Porch, The Monkey Bar all within a close skip from the front door of this tiny street that also boasts a pocket park!
Tenant pays all utilities, except water.
December 1st, 1 year lease, credit check needed.
Get in touch soon to schedule a time to see the space and make this gem yours before the holidays!

description:

description:

Bath includes large tub/shower, tile floor, and full-size closet.  The entire apt. home is fully sprinklered and hard-wired smoke detection system.   All rooms are cable/internet ready. title: 136 Neyland Ct
description:
Welcome to 136 Neyland Court Exton PA in Rhondda community! Available immediately to move in. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath well maintained townhome in the highly desired community of Rhondda has been nicely upgraded throughout. The home boast amenities and convenience! The main floor features laminate hardwood floors throughout with upgraded kitchen and dining area. The kitchen has new granite counters with under mount sink, stainless steel appliances including built in dishwasher, microwave, electric glass flat top stove and a French door refrigerator. The main floor also has an updated powder room with glass bowl vanity and barn style door to additional under step storage, as well as a large living room with 8' sliding glass door to a rear patio and fenced in yard. The second floor of the home boasts what can be deemed a double master floor plan, with two additional sizable bedrooms that both hold private en-suites and ample closet space.The living Room has an abundance of natural light with sliding glass doors to the deck perfect for parties and BBQ's. Fully finished walkout basement gives excellent space for private office, kids play area and entertainment area.
Additional features include:: two designated parking spots, wood tread stairway. replacement 6-panel white doors throughout. the laundry room conveniently located between 2 bedrooms on the 2nd floor. A commuter's dream, the home is within minutes of Rt. 100, Rt. 113, Rt. 30 bypass, Rt. 202, Exton Mall, the PA Turnpike, SEPTA R5 train and corporate centers. The Home owners Association includes the swimming pool, tennis courts, playgrounds, walking trails, fishing pond, kids play area, clubhouse and planned activities. Close to schools, shopping, entertainment and restaurants. Come in and look at it!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Package Room, Dog Spa, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and peaks of South Philly in between high-rise buildings. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen features a fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Tselaine, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, Veda, The Love, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Bluestone Lane. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop for produce and flowers at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There are many banks in the neighborhood, including TD Bank in the building. This building has the best location!

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a part of history
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of restaurants, cafes and bars. You'll be steps from the Lombard-South Station for the Broad Street Line, plus surrounded by public transportation bus routes. Walkable to the Marian Anderson Recreation Center and Rittenhouse Square. Check out neighborhood hotspots like Bob & Barbara's Lounge, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, Loco Pez, Tio Flores, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and monthly pet rent of $30/month for dogs and $25/month for cats). There is a maximum weight of 30lbs for dogs. description: This stunning, modern home in Newbold provides a bright open floor plan with plenty of living space and a rooftop deck! This two-story home also offers 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, 1,750 sq.ft., a finished basement, and a fenced-in rear yard. Enter into the living room that fills with natural sunlight and leads directly to the dining and kitchen area with lovely wood flooring throughout and custom metal railings. Impress your guests with your spacious rooftop deck and unparalleled city views! This is the perfect place to relax and customize your own outdoor space. If you are not entertaining your guests out back or on the rooftop deck, you can use the finished basement that's fully equipped with a full bathroom. Conveniently located near public transportation and the many great restaurants and bars South Philly has to offer. Don't wait and make your appointment today!

title: Two professional guys looking for a third roommate in our house
description:
Hi there!
We are two professional guys in our late twenties looking for a third roommate in our house! We like to have fun, !!!playing video games, watching shows, social drinking, working out, and going with the flow. We both work hybrid schedules for work. You can have friends/sigs over but, no house parties. This is a drug-free house, and doesn’t permit smoking cigarettes on the premises. While we love cats and dogs to death, we are not allowing any. We’re very clean and respectful of one another and are looking for a roommate that shares these qualities. No couples.The house: The house was built a couple decades ago, but has been updated on the inside! We have a ton of space inside on the 2nd and 3rd floor. The landlord is super chill, and his brother lives on the first floor. We have a front-facing porch on the 2nd floor that stretches along the entire front of our house. We use it all spring, summer, and fall. The house has two full bathrooms, one on the main floor, and one on the second floor. All rooms have beautiful, new hardwood floors. The kitchen has been updated with stainless steel appliances which include a refrigerator, oven and gas range, and dishwasher. The house has central AC, heat, and ceiling fans in every room. We do not have on-site washing and drying, but are two blocks away from a laundromat that includes a drop-off service.The room: The room is the first room at the top of the staircase. It has the largest closet in the house (semi-walk-in), and has a front of the house-facing sliding door. The bathroom would be shared with the other tenant on the second floor.Rent and Utilities: Move-in would be SEPT 1st. Rent is $540 due at the first of every month. No brokerage fee, and no security deposit, but first and last is due at signing in addition to a background and credit check. The minimum lease is one year. Utilities are not included. Internet, electricity, and gas are split 3 ways.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Concierge, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, L'Occitane, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Spice Finch, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Restaurant Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Grab a French baguette or slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Relax in the Wintergarden at Dilworth Park. There is so much to do in this neighborhood!

description:

This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 15, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Scotch & Soda, Bluemercury, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, Monks' Cafe, Marathon on the Square, Rosy's Taco Bar, and Scarpetta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, and Di Bruno Bros. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy baked goods at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
